Desc.entry: A voluntary not-for-profit organisation which takes in and sells donated goods in order to raise awareness of cancer related illnesses, especially involving children. Organises charity golf days. Please contact by email in the first instance.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues 1-4pm, Thurs 10am-2pm term-time only (Information and book shop)

category.entry: HEALTH - FUNDRAISING, RESEARCH AND VOLUNTARY SUPPORT
